entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy. Blowing snow early in the evening. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023
